attributes.action: Ask Queen Elizabeth to Remove Gordon Brown
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We ask Queen Elizabeth to remove the insertion of an unlawful PM.

The party election of an unlawful prime minister is unlawful under our right to Vote.

This right has been taken from us without any trial whatsoever.

Gordon Brown aproaches countrys on a daily basis on behalf of a so called elected free nation.  Sometimes using military force this party elected offical makes decisions on our behalf here and abroad. 

However he was not elected in a free election by this nation.

Our right to choose has been taken from us. One of our most protected rights in the European Union.

Please do the right thing and support this  movement.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
